thread.title: WATCH: Pete Genovese talks about the ultimate search for N.J's best diner
thread.title_full: WATCH: Pete Genovese talks about the ultimate search for N.J's best diner

author: Peter Genovese | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: Pete Genovese talks about the ultimate search for N.J's best diner
text:
Comments 
I'm back from vacation, and in my latest video chat I announce some big news! 
Our latest N.J's best project will be the tastiest and toughest yet -- a search for the state's best diner. 
In the chat, I'll explain how it will work-- nominations begin Monday -- and what we'll be looking for. 
Join me and Chris Kelly, managing producer, entertainment, NJ Advance Media, in our latest chat. 
It's must-see Jersey food TV!
